titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that a consent to waive a survivor annuity form of retirement benefit shall also be effective if made before marriage.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1776-1777)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 8/19/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide that a consent to waive a survivor annuity form of retirement benefit may be made before marriage.
